attributes.action: U.K immigration ( home office ) should lower their application fees
attributes.background: The home office should lower the application fees which is really high I am a single parent and have to pay high fees in order to stay here ..application fees touching £1500 and medical fees which is £200 a year  when I am working on min wage . I have British child

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like these Home Office fees to be reduced, but we're not sure by how much. You could start a new petition saying what you think the fees should be. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
